mutants.code:
def min_moves_to_palindrome(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    cur = res = 1
    for i in range(n):
        need = max(0, arr[n - 1 - i] - arr[i])
        res += max(0, need - cur)
        cur = need
    return res

def min_moves_to_palindrome(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    cur = res = -1
    for i in range(n):
        need = max(0, arr[n - 1 - i] - arr[i])
        res += max(0, need - cur)
        cur = need
    return res

def min_moves_to_palindrome(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    cur = res = 0
    for i in range(n):
        need = max(0, arr[n - 1 - i] - arr[i])
        res -= max(0, need - cur)
        cur = need
    return res
